function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased building operational energy and associated GHG emissions due to technological advances in building design.","Impact":"Contributes to climate change and environmental degradation.","Mitigation":"Adopting energy-efficient building technologies and renewable energy sources, as well as promoting sustainable design practices.","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy-efficient HVAC systems, smart building automation systems.","People":"Inhabitants, environmentalists, and future generations at risk.","Owner":"Architects, engineers, and policy makers."},{"Description":"Building-related health issues due to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Public health risks and potential pandemics, increased societal instability.","Mitigation":"Implementing biosafety materials, ventilation systems, and design strategies that reduce virus transmission.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C light disinfection, antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Building occupants, urban residents, and the general public at risk.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and public health officials."}]}
